result.purpose: Responsible for managing a pool of worker goroutines to process jobs concurrently.
result.architecture: The folder follows a concurrent processing architecture using goroutines to handle job execution in a worker pool.

pkg/worker/config.go.purpose: Defines a configuration structure for a worker package.

pkg/worker/dispatcher.go.purpose: This file implements a dispatcher that manages a pool of worker goroutines to process jobs concurrently.
side_effects: Blocks on worker job channel until a worker is available
risks: Potential deadlock if jobQueue is not managed properly
Resource exhaustion if too many jobs are added without available workers

pkg/worker/job.go.purpose: Defines a Job type with an executable function.

pkg/worker/worker.go.purpose: This file defines a Worker type that manages job execution in a worker pool.
side_effects: Starts a goroutine for job processing
risks: Potential for goroutine leaks if not properly stopped
